imports.description: [TypeScript] Specify imports that your code depends on. If you use `full` for `validatorOption`, you need to specify import as `evil-type` as `{ EvilType }` here.

regexpTest.description: [TypeScript] Custom RegExp Test Function like (pattern: string, flags: string, text: string): boolean => new RegExp(pattern, flags).test(text)

schema.description: [JSON Schema] If you want to generate JSON Schema, specify this option.

externalReferMapping.description: [JSON Schema] Mapping of external schemas to reference

tsPattern.description: [TypeScript] You can define Template Literal Types. Arrays are OR-combined. You need to match the regular expression in `pattern` and Template Literal Types.

regexpTest.description: [TypeScript] Custom RegExp Test Function like (pattern: string, flags: string, text: string): boolean => new RegExp(pattern, flags).test(text)

tsPattern.description: [TypeScript] You can define Template Literal Types. Arrays are OR-combined. You need to match the regular expression in `pattern` and Template Literal Types.
